title: Bloomberg Markets: Rothbort Says Zoes Management Didn't Deliver
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Rothbort Says Zoes Management Didn't Deliver
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Scott R Rothbort President/Founder Lakeview Asset Management LLC Discussing why the management of Zoe's Kitchen was unable to transition from a private enterprise to a public company.
